missions.name: Last Minute
missions.description: Drink only during the 3rd lap of each race.

missions.name: Pacing
missions.description: *Must* have 5 gulps per race excluding last race.

missions.name: Smuggler
missions.description: Finish *two* races holding or using a powerful item.
details: Applicable items: Star, lightning, bullet bill, blue shell, golden mushroom, endless 8.

missions.name: Janitor
missions.description: Clean up 8 stationary non-coin items.

missions.name: Forgot my Keys
missions.description: On *two* races, starting after the drink line, you must touch twelfth place.

missions.name: Showboating
missions.description: Can only start drinking in 1st place.
details: You can keep drinking even if you leave 1st place.
If you pause your chug and you're no longer in first, stop drinking.

missions.name: Randomizer
missions.description: Use this random loadout:

missions.name: Sheep
missions.description: Can only start a drink after someone else puts down their drink.
details: Online Only: You must announce your mission at the start of the Gran Prix

missions.name: Item Masher
missions.description: Hold every item for less than 2 seconds before using it.

missions.name: Locked Out
missions.description: On *two* races, you can't use your first item.

missions.name: One in the Chamber
missions.description: Can't use any bullet bills.
details: Lose them through getting shocked or ghosted.

missions.name: Stockpile
missions.description: Must always have a second item on hold before you hold or use an item.
details: You can not use your item before picking up a double.

missions.name: Picky Drinker
missions.description: You can only drink while holding this random item:

missions.name: TheOddOne
missions.description: Start drinking in an odd numbered place, stop drinking in an odd numbered place.
details: You're playing with fire if you are pushing on 11th.

missions.name: Banker
missions.description: Drink while only at 10 coins.

missions.name: Designated Driver
missions.description: Can only drink while Lakitu is carrying you.
details: You are permitted 1 addition gulp upon landing.

missions.name: Tavern Brawler
missions.description: This random race number is the only race you can drink your entire beer:

missions.name: Masochist
missions.description: Designate a player at the start. Get hit by that player twice.
details: Running into their hazardous behind counts.

missions.name: Gary Oak
missions.description: The first player who pisses you off during the Gran Prix is your rival. You must hit them 3 times.

missions.name: Too Shocked To Drink
missions.description: Can only have 1 drink session per race. If you’re shocked, you can’t drink. If you are drinking when shocked, put down your drink.
details: If you start drinking on lap 1, you can only drink 4 gulps.
If you start drinking on lap 2, you can only drink 7 gulps.
If you start drinking on lap 3, you can drink as long as you aren’t shocked.
On race 4 lap 3, you can finish your drink.

missions.name: Secret Santa
missions.description: Bestow 3 positive effects to others with any rotating item around you.
details: This is a hard to see visual effect - the item isn't consumed.

missions.name: Pack Rat
missions.description: If you get 6th or 7th place in the Grand Prix, you win alongside the next best player.
details: You must announce your mission at the start of the Gran Prix
Deep inside, you didn't win.
Other players are permitted to call out Pack Rat as their secret mission in reaction.
Their mission becomes Pack Rat instead of what it originally was.

missions.name: Bumper Cars
missions.description: You must bump all other players 4 times. Each player must be bumped once.
details: You must announce your mission at the start of the Gran Prix
A bump is any non-agressive contact with your vehicle and another one

missions.name: The Mark
missions.description: Mark-drift over 2 coin collections.
details: Mark-drift: Pick up all coins (at least 3) from a string of coins designed to be picked up with proper steering/drifting.

missions.name: Watch Your Back
missions.description: While in first, you must toggle rear view camera at least every 2 seconds.

missions.name: Double or Nothing
missions.description: You are unable to drink for the rest of the race once you pick up a non-double item block.

missions.name: Drowning in Sorrow
missions.description: You can only drink while submerged in water.

coop_granprix.name: Mission Marathon
coop_granprix.description: At the start of each race, attempt a single race mission.
details: You lose if you fail *half or more* of these challenges.

coop_granprix.name: Mimicry
coop_granprix.description: Two players must finish with the exact same score.
details: For the first half of the races, attempt a single race mission.
You lose if you fail *more than half* of the single race challenges

coop_granprix.name: Share in the Glory
coop_granprix.description: Each player must finish in first. Someone different must always place first.
details: If races outnumber players, no player can have more than two firsts over another player.

coop_granprix.name: The Perfect Run
coop_granprix.description: One player must finish 1st in every race.

coop_granprix.name: Cascade
coop_granprix.description: A drink session can only be started once each race. Only one person can drink at a time. When one person finishes, another can start.
details: You can’t partake twice in the same session.

coop_granprix.name: With Friends Like These
coop_granprix.description: Every player must hit each other player once.

coop_granprix.name: Jack of All Trades
coop_granprix.description: Every item must be used at least once.

coop_granprix.name: Blue%
coop_granprix.description: One player must dodge a blue shell.
details: While in first, any item use that disrupts or avoids the blue shell counts.

coop_granprix.name: Identity Crisis
coop_granprix.description: Whenever a lightning bolt or blooper occurs, everyone must pass the controller to another player.

coop_granprix.name: Collectathon
coop_granprix.description: At any point in the race, all players must have 10 coins at the same time.

coop_granprix.name: Killing Spree (GP Edition)
coop_granprix.description: Computers must be hit a number of times equal to the number of players times 4.

coop_granprix.name: Soul-locked Drinking (GP Edition)
coop_granprix.description: Everyone must drink at the same time.

coop_granprix.name: Get Down Mr. President (GP Edition)
coop_granprix.description: Designate one player before the race starts. They can’t get hit more than 6 times *and* must finish 1st - 3rd by the end of the Gran Prix.
details: Shocks don’t count - they are an aspect of nature.

coop_granprix.name: Tag Team (GP Edition)
coop_granprix.description: Break into pairs or triples. If you’re not leading, you must always have line of sight of another teammate.
details: If you aren’t, the person leading must stop accelerating.
At the start of each race, you can willingly keep or swap your partners.

coop_granprix.name: Squad Goals
coop_granprix.description: Every player must use the same random loadout.

coop_single.name: Clean Sweep
coop_single.description: All players must be in the top placements
details: Four players must finish as 1, 2, 3, and 4.

coop_single.name: Apes Strong Together
coop_single.description: Each player must get fed 1 banana.
details: The banana must be trailing a racer and not lying on the ground.

coop_single.name: Killing Spree
coop_single.description: Computers must be hit a number of times equal to the number of players times 2.

coop_single.name: Bullying
coop_single.description: Designate one CPU before the race starts. They must get hit a number of times equal to the number of players.

coop_single.name: Soul-locked Drinking
coop_single.description: Everyone must drink at the same time.

coop_single.name: Get Down Mr. President
coop_single.description: Designate one player before the race starts. They can’t get hit more than 3 times *and* must finish 1st - 3rd.
details: Shocks don’t count - they are an aspect of nature.

coop_single.name: Tag Team
coop_single.description: Break into pairs or triples. If you’re not leading, you must always have line of sight of another teammate.
details: If you aren’t, the person leading must stop accelerating.

coop_single.name: Hivemind
coop_single.description: Call out when using an item, everyone else must press the item button.

coop_single.name: YOU - SHALL NOT - PASS
coop_single.description: Designate one player before the race starts. After the beer line, at no point can no other player pass the designated player.

coop_single.name: Hand Holding
coop_single.description: Everyone must finish within 2 seconds of each other.
details: Do this by waiting before the finish line on the 3rd lap.

coop_single.name: Waiting in Line
coop_single.description: While 1 player is using Bullet Bill, the other players can’t drive.
